definitions.definition: A common true thrush , Turdus merula , found in woods and gardens over much of Eurasia , and introduced elsewhere.
A variety of New World birds of the family Icteridae (26 species of icterid bird).
A native of the South Pacific islands.
definitions.label_groups: slang , derogatory , historical , among slavers and pirates

main_definition: A common true thrush , Turdus merula , found in woods and gardens over much of Eurasia , and introduced elsewhere.
secondary_definitions: A variety of New World birds of the family Icteridae (26 species of icterid bird).
( slang , derogatory , historical , among slavers and pirates ) A native of the South Pacific islands.
